0. 333 (10->16):  3x16^0+3x16^1+3x16^2 = 3+48+768=  819

1. 200345 (10->10):  5x10^0 + 4x10^1 + 3x10^2 + 0x10^3 + 0x10^4  +2x10^5

2. 637 (10->16):  637/624/D |39/32/7 |2| = 27D

27D (16->10): 13x16^0 + 7x16^1 + 2x16^2 = 637

3. 637 (10->2):  637|318|159|79|39|19|9|4|2|1| = 1001111101

4. 111000111 (2->10):  =  1|3|7|14|28|57|115|231 = 231

5. 637 (10->3) :  637|212|70|23|7|2| = 212121
